thread.title: Aerosmith frontman asks Trump campaign to stop using song
thread.title_full: Aerosmith frontman asks Trump campaign to stop using song

title: Aerosmith frontman asks Trump campaign to stop using song
text:
> Entertainment Aerosmith frontman asks Trump campaign to stop using song FILE - In this Friday, Nov. 14, 2014, file photo, Steven Tyler arrives at the Hollywood Film Awards at the Palladium, in Los Angeles. Aerosmith frontman Tyler is asking Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump to stop using the power ballad "Dream On" at campaign events. (Photo by Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP, File) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
